=================

**Government of Canada: Request for Proposal - HVAC Upgrade in Fort Smith, NT**
================================================================================

### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3839727738
*   **Title (English):** Upgrade of HVAC Building Management System Controls in Fort Smith Government of Canada Building
*   **Title (French):** Mise à niveau des commandes du système de gestion de l'immeuble CVCA dans l'immeuble du gouvernement du Canada de Fort Smith
*   **Bid Deadline:** 2023-04-04T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-03-16
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-04-03
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Technical and Business Requirements

*   The bid solicitation is seeking a contractor to upgrade the Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Building Management System controls in the Fort Smith Government of Canada Building.
*   The project requires the contractor to provide design, installation, and testing services for the HVAC system upgrade.
*   The selected contractor will be responsible for ensuring compliance with applicable government regulations and standards.

### Tender Process and Evaluation Criteria

*   This bid solicitation is a competitive process, open to all qualified contractors.
*   The tender will be evaluated based on lowest price, with consideration of other factors such as technical merit and capability.
*   A debriefing or feedback session will be provided to all bidders upon request.

### Contact Information

*   For more information, please visit the [bid solicitation webpage](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15722188?extsite=MTU3MjIxODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
*   If you have any questions or require clarification on the bid solicitation, please contact Eric Kwan, at eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
